title: VMware vCenter Server JMX RMI Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of VMware vCenter Server. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists in the configuration of the JMX remote interface. This interface allows a remote attacker to register attacker-controlled mbeans. This vulnerability can be leveraged by an attacker to gain remote code execution under the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: VMware, Inc. has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.vmware.com/security/advisories/VMSA-2015-0007
timeline:
2015-04-07 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2015-10-02 - Coordinated public release of advisory
